parameters.name: Note
parameters.description:
The description of the invitation.

The description can be up to 1,024 characters in length.

parameters.name: ParentFolderId
parameters.description: The ID of the parent folder.

parameters.name: TargetEntity
parameters.description: The ID or logon email address of the account that you want to invite.

parameters.name: TargetType
parameters.description:
The type of the invited account. Valid values:

*   Account: indicates the ID of the account.
*   Email: indicates the logon email address of the account.
